reviews.text: We had initially booked a room for 4 people at the 'Hotel de la Moneda', this hotel's sister establishment, almost next door. However, because of a mix up with the date of arrival, we were allocated a room at the Hotel Canet instead.
reviews.title: Hospitality at its best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff in both hotels were outstandingly welcoming, and as it turned out, we were thrilled with our room : while not as modern in design as the one we had hoped to stay in, it was HUGE (an apartment -type suite in fact, with 2 separate bedrooms :1 double, 1 twin ,a very large living room + BIG bathroom) very comfortable and immaculately clean.
reviews.title: 4 star restuarant with 2 star rooms
